Enteringthetutorialstage.Text: Nice to meet you Player! I am Fairie! Are you ready to go on an adventure?
Don’t worry I will be here to assist you whenever we come across something worth noting!
Let’s start with the basics. You can use spells to perform actions on the stage!

Enteringthetutorial.Text: Drag the move left and move right spells from the actions tab down to your action queue.
Try to go next to the light in front of you using your movement spells.
Note that everytime you collide with that light. I will be able to guide you

Onceneartheiceblock.Text: Note that you can perform up to three spells at a time!
The sequence in which your spells take effect is from left to right in your action queue!
Plan your spells accordingly and make sure they are on the correct sequence before you execute them.
Now… looks like this ice block is obstructing us from getting out of here.
If I remember correctly, I think fire can get rid of ice.

Destroyingtheiceblock.Text: Great job! You managed to melt down the ice cube with a fireball attack.
Remember, different elemental attacks affect different obstacles in different ways!
Try to evaluate the stage before you plan your strategy!
Maybe you could recognize a pattern in how elemental attacks affect certain obstacles.

pickingupamaterial.Text: Wow look at that! You obtained a piece of metal!
Maybe this is something we could use later!
